snippet: Israeli soldiers on Thursday fatally shot a Palestinian man who drove a construction vehicle into an army base near Ramallah in the West Bank, the Israeli military said.
abstract: Israeli soldiers fatally shoot Palestinian man who drove a construction vehicle into army base near Ramallah in the West Bank, barged through gate and repeatedly tried to run over a soldier.
lead_paragraph: Israeli soldiers on Thursday fatally shot a Palestinian man who drove a construction vehicle into an army base near Ramallah in the West Bank, the Israeli military said.

headline.main: Israel: Palestinian Is Killed at Army Base
headline.print_headline: Israel: Palestinian Killed at Army Base
